text: Hélène Elizabeth Louise Amélie Paula Dolores Poniatowska (born May 19, 1932), known professionally as Elena Poniatowska (), is a French-born Mexican journalist and author. She began writing for the newspaper Excélsior, doing interviews and society columns. She is considered to be “Mexico's grande dame of letters” and is still an active writer. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican journalists Category:Mexican writers Category:French journalists Category:Writers from Paris Category:Miguel de Cervantes Prize winners
title: Elena Poniatowska
